definition: complete change (idiom); facelift/We're in a wholly new situation.
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
eye/item/section/list/catalogue/table of contents/order (taxonomy)/goal/name/title
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
new/newly/meso- (chemistry)

sentences.english: The five boys who came to play video games reshuffled everything.
sentences.chinese: 五個去玩電子遊戲的男孩讓羅斯家面目一新。

sentences.english: Each day takes on a new face.
Besides, some figures with entirely new appearance suddenly come into our sight.
sentences.chinese: 除此，還有一些面目一新的人物闖入我們的視線。

sentences.english: The chang looked at from head to foot the face a new corvee horror.
sentences.chinese: 基昌看着從頭到腳面目一新的英熙後大喫一驚。

sentences.english: First his humble little shop became a smart one.
sentences.chinese: 先是他那寒磣的小店變得面目一新了。

definition: to look completely new (idiom); brand new/changed beyond recognition
to shed one's mortal body and exchange one's bones (idiom); born again Daoist/to turn over a new leaf/fig. to change wholly/to create from other material (story, artwork etc)
a pleasant change/a breath of fresh air/refreshing
appearance/face/features/CL:個|个[ge4]
neatly/tidy
to discard the old and introduce the new (idiom); to innovate
in high spirits (idiom); glowing with health and vigor
lit. clear window and clean table (idiom)/fig. bright and clean
sky and the earth turning upside down (idiom); fig. complete confusion/everything turned on its head
beautiful and heartwarming
full of vitality
face glowing (idiom); looking radiant/all smiles
lit. the spring comes upon a withered tree (idiom)/fig. to get a new lease on life/to be revived/(of a difficult situation) to suddenly improve
see 生機盎然|生机盎然[sheng1 yi4 ang4 ran2]
style/manner/ethos
see 生機盎然|生机盎然[sheng1 ji1 ang4 ran2]
